bioconda.name: blast
bioconda.summary: BLAST+ is a new suite of BLAST tools that utilizes the NCBI C++ Toolkit.

biotools.summary: A tool that finds regions of similarity between biological sequences. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance.

bioschemas.name: BLAST
bioschemas.summary: A tool that finds regions of similarity between biological sequences. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance.
